PreceptDef.label: strength
PreceptDef.description:
Bonewalkers are our avengers, and as such they must be ready to fight.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - Bonewalker strength is enhanced, causing them to deal more damage.

PreceptDef.label: durability
PreceptDef.description:
Bonewalkers are our guardians, and as such they must be ready to protect.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - Bonewalker durability is enhanced, causing them to take less damage.

PreceptDef.label: quality
PreceptDef.description:
Bonewalkers are only as strong as the hands that make them.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - Any bonewalkers activated will be one quality level higher, being able to surpass legendary quality.

PreceptDef.label: intelligence
PreceptDef.description:
Bonewalkers are only as strong as the minds that make them.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - Bonewalkers will no longer become grave revenants, as long as the primary ideology of the colony has this precept.
